TopicTitle: Intro song with a bit of a visual backend

Articles.Content:
As much fun as I had making my homage to the intro song, I decided to give a back end view of what the software programs and VSTs look like. It's a pretty short video, but I hope to start to do a bit more on the visual side of music. It's better when you can see where it all comes from IMO.

Let me know what you think!
WAAAAAAAAAAAAAY too much talking at the beginning. 1/3 of the video is talking with no music.

Lol, sorry about that GregroxMun, I was shooting to explain why I posted the second video of the song. I may chop that vocal off and offer just the song and visual without my intro blabbering.

Thx!
Oh look, a fellow Fruity Loops user!
Hey PXI, yeah I've been using the program for quite some time now. I doubt I could change to anything else now. Especially as well as it works with EWQL!
I love this remix! Well done, sir!

Thanks Thomas, I learned alot from this remix. Blending instruments was fun but boy oh boy does it strain my PC with that number of samples on load up. After that its fine. The latest FL Studio does well with more RAM to drain. lol
